definition: To pass by or drop by a place, often used to describe the action of visiting someone's home or stopping by a specific location.

examples.german: Ich werde morgen bei dir vorbeikommen.
examples.english: I will come by your place tomorrow.

examples.german: Komm doch mal vorbei, wenn du Zeit hast.
examples.english: Come by sometime when you have time.

examples.german: Er ist gestern an mir vorbeigekommen, ohne mich zu grüßen.
examples.english: He passed by me yesterday without greeting me.

examples.german: Ich komme später vorbei und hole die Sachen ab.
examples.english: I'll come by later and pick up the things.
